title: Coming Soon / Under Construction Landing Page

requirements.text: Create a visually engaging 'Coming Soon' / 'Under Construction' landing page that informs visitors the website is being built and will be available soon.

quotes: جب تک وہاں ویب سائٹ بن رہی ہے

acceptanceCriteria: Page displays a clear 'Coming Soon' or 'Under Construction' heading in English
Page includes a short friendly message letting visitors know the site is being prepared
Page is centered and responsive on both desktop and mobile screens
Generated background or hero image is displayed as a static asset

requirements.text: Apply a bold, modern visual theme with a dark background, vibrant accent colors (e.g., amber/gold or teal), elegant typography, and subtle animated elements (e.g., a pulsing icon or fade-in text) to create a polished first impression. Enforce this theme consistently across all page elements.
acceptanceCriteria: A consistent color palette using dark background with a vibrant accent is applied throughout
Typography is modern and readable with clear visual hierarchy
At least one subtle animation (fade-in, pulse, or shimmer) is present
The design looks polished on both mobile and desktop

nonGoals: No backend logic or data persistence is needed
No countdown timer or email subscription form unless explicitly requested

required: Dark abstract background with soft geometric shapes and a glowing amber/gold gradient focal point, suitable for a coming soon page (coming-soon-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
